channel.title: HedgeDoc - Collaborative markdown editor
channel.description: Recent content on HedgeDoc - Collaborative markdown editor
channel.copyright: The HedgeDoc developers. Theme based on [vex-hugo](https://github.com/themefisher/vex-hugo).

item.title: FAQ
item.description: This page is intended to provide answers to some questions that frequently appear in the community. How stable is the demo instance?

item.title: History
item.description: HedgeDoc is the community-driven fork of CodiMD, which is the open source counterpart to HackMD. Confused? Let us explain: May '15 The first commit in the history of HackMD is made.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Preamble: Hosting Details The HedgeDoc landing page is a static site that does not track, collect, store any information, or set any cookies.
